songs.lyrics:
Proper patola, nakhra ae swag
Suit Patiala shaahi chunni teri black
Oh munde haunke bharde tainu tak tak ke
Nache jadon hath tu lakk utte rakh ke

Proper patola, nakhra ae swag
Suit Patiala shaahi chunni meri black
Oh munde haunke bharde mainu tak tak ke
Nachan jadon hath main lakk utte rakh ke

Look rab ne husna di rakhi koyi thod ni
Gallan di laali nu makeup di koyi lod ni
Phul ne gulaab de, bull ne janaab de
Sonh lagge mummy di mainu
Tera koyi tod ni
Thodi te til kala kudiye ni baatan paave
Suit Patiala, Gucci Vucci nu maatha paave
Ghar tera ni main aape lab loon
Saanu bas dass ja tu naa

Proper patola, nakhra ae swag
Suit Patiala shaahi chunni teri black
Oh munde haunke bharde tainu tak tak ke
Nache jadon hath tu lakk utte rakh ke

Main la doon tujhe haar
Pehna doon tujhe kangan
Ho taiyar, ghuma doon tujhe London
Hath mein rakhun hath rakhe jis cheez pe
Heere jadwa doon teri kaali kameez pe
Aaja mere paas, kar ghuzarish
Paise ki kya baat
Kar doon noton ki baarish
Itna na soch hath mera thaam
Tujhe yaad rahegi zindagi bhar yeh shaam

Ja mundeya ve tere vass di ni gall
Na nach mere naal aake tu close
Haan chal patli gali se tu nikal
Tere jaison ko rakhti hoon on toes
Kyun bole lie tu, na kare try tu
Ja ja tu bete ghar ja

Proper patola, nakhra ae swag
Suit Patiala shaahi chunni teri black
Oh munde haunke bharde tainu tak tak ke
Nache jadon hath tu lakk utte rakh ke

Proper patola, nakhra ae swag
Suit Patiala shaahi chunni meri black
Oh munde haunke bharde mainu tak tak ke
Nachan jadon hath main lakk utte rakh ke
songs.title: PROPER PATOLA (Namaste England)
